title: SKT Skins with a twist, Can a Rioter get this thro to the design team to look at ?
body:
So SKT won worlds, the skins IMO should be: (with the twist at the end of the thread)
{{champion:114}} Top for **MaRin**, he showed exceptional performance on her throughout worlds.
{{champion:12}} Supp for **Wolf**, he actually said that he wants to see SKT Ali
{{champion:429}} ADC for **Bang**, no team allowed him to pick her, professionally undefeated on Kalista
{{champion:60}} Jungle for **Bengi**, his most used champ in worlds 2015
{{champion:13}} Mid for **Faker**, only one who played Ryze in worlds 2015, he did well with him

Fiora, Alistar, Kalista, Elise, Ryze are all champs that dont have the "team" skin yet too.
The twist is that these champs spell out Faker XD

also, SKT Azir for Easyhoon

Any chance on Riot reverting the Dynamic Group crap in solo queue ? 

One of the most complained about aspects of solo queue was the duo queue portion of it. Why on earth would you people choose to expand on the part most people voiced displeasure with ?

What does Riot have against solo players ? Why are you guys punishing us ?

I was looking forward to all of the awesome changes and improvements within the client and the new team builder style queue, but Dynamic Groups completely ruin it. If this goes live I will never play ranked again and I am so disappointed in you guys.

> [{quoted}](name=Kat  Head,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WGfEH7Ms,comment-id=0005000100010000,timestamp=2015-11-04T17:12:56.210+0000)

> I was looking forward to all of the awesome changes and improvements within the client and the new team builder style queue, but Dynamic Groups completely ruin it. If this goes live I will never play ranked again and I am so disappointed in you guys.

First I have to point out that I'm a concept artist on skins so I am not involved with any of the preseason changes. **Speaking personally** I am really excited about this because being forced to play a competitive team game _by myself_ was my 'least favourite' experience I've had playing league. I was even hesitant to duo queue because I heard it increases your MMR. I think that ranked should reflect how well you play all aspects of League of Legends including communication and teamwork and not just how well you can stomp/carry.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=WGfEH7Ms,comment-id=00050001000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-04T17:42:01.934+0000)

> First I have to point out that I'm a concept artist on skins so I am not involved with any of the preseason changes. **Speaking personally** I am really excited about this because being forced to play a competitive team game _by myself_ was my 'least favourite' experience I've had playing league. I was even hesitant to duo queue because I heard it increases your MMR. I think that ranked should reflect how well you play all aspects of League of Legends including communication and teamwork and not just how well you can stomp/carry.

Do you honestly feel skillful when you are duo queue and pug stomping people ? Do you not realize you are utilizing advantages that the other player does not have or have access to ? You honestly feel good about abusing one of the more shady features of solo ranked ?

I can understand people wanting to play with there friends, the vast majority of people who queue in groups are not friends.  Those types of people are the same people who swap to whatever champ is fotm, these are soulless elo seeking people who care only about what advantages they can secure for themselves and care not for the good of the game or there fellow players. I only play solo, I do not wish to play in a group. I have always felt like duo queue was "cheating". This game already has group queues for 3s and 5s and you can play several different modes for fun in normal games. There are plenty of options to play this game in a group of "friends", while there are no options for those seeking to play a team game solo.

If Riot wants to make some type of flex queue it should be a different queue than solo queue. Allow people to queue in groups of 2,3 and 5, but do not put those teams into solo queue.

Why remove solo queue ? 

Does Riot not understand how many people this will alienate and what this will do to high elo game play ?

Does Riot not understand how much toxicity this will add to the game ?

Why does Riot want me to feel / be completely helpless ?

How can Riot not know this is already the worst part of ranked (duo) and normals (2,3,4) ?

In this game duo queue is one of the most complained about aspects of ranked.

Having a duo on your team and winning is not fun. Having a duo on your team and losing is not fun.

Look at every other single online game and you will find the exact same complaints from people. Coordination is unfair vs uncoordinated people and many people such as myself have no desire whatsoever to queue in a group. The rare times I have done so in wow, I felt so dirty. I honestly felt like I had injured the integrity of the game and my own integrity (the things you do for girls). 

This game needs a solo only queue. 


Sorry for the rant, and thank you so much for taking the time to reply with your honest opinion.

Maybe I am alone in this opinion and this will work out fine for Riot, I just have never seen or heard of another game where something like this would not be looked upon with disdain.
